headline: Bloom Energy Corporation (BE): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Bloom Energy Corporation on Valueinvestorsclub.com by jd5318. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on BE. Bloom Energy Corporation’s share was trading at $52.45 as of September 3rd. BE’s trailing and forward P/E were 476.82 and 63.29 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
